label: 輔仁親王
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (1073-1119). Also known as San no Miya 三宮 (the Third Prince"). Son of Go-Sanjo and Minamoto no Motoko. Half-brother of Shirakawa. Hosted several poetry gatherings at his mansion in the Ninna-ji. Kanshi in Honchō mudaishi 本朝無題詩 (24), Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集 (5). Waka (17) in several imperial anthologies. [後三条、源基子、白河、仁和寺、漢詩、和歌] "
